title: Are They Serious Players?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss how they explain the Bear’s domination win on Monday Night Football last night, how seriously they take the Dodgers as serious players for Aaron Judge, and Brian Windhorst joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Bears dominate the Patriots and are the Dodgers in the running for Aaron Judge?
